Paragraph.Text: The division shall by rules and regulations prescribe curricula and standards for advanced and specialized training courses and training in addition to those prescribed in ss. 633.34 and 633.35.
The standards provided by this section shall not bind any employing agency as to the requirements it may have for promoting personnel.

Subsection.Text: Fire departments or any fire service participating under the provisions of this section shall adhere to the standards and procedures established by the division.
